name: abundant
trans: adj. 大量的, 充足的副 词: abundantly

sentences.english: an abundant supply of fresh water
sentences.chinese: 充足的淡水供应

sentences.english: abundant opportunities for well qualified staff
sentences.chinese: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

detailed_translations.chinese: 丰富的， 富裕的； 大量的， 充足的
detailed_translations.english: something that is abundant exists or is available in large quantities so that there is more than enough

name: accumulate
trans: vt. & vi. 堆积；积累时 态: accumulated，accumulating，accumulates

sentences.english: It is unjust that a privileged few should continue to accumulate wealth.
sentences.chinese: 少数特权阶级继续积聚财富，这是不公平的。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time
to gradually get more and more money, possessions, knowledge etc over a period of time

name: acid
trans: adj. 酸味的, 酸的; 尖刻的; n. 〈化〉酸; 酸味物质 副 词: acidly 名 词: acidness

sentences.english: sulphuric acid
sentences.chinese: 硫酸

sentences.english: a juicy apple with a slightly acid flavour
sentences.chinese: 一个多汁、略带酸味的苹果

sentences.english: I was expecting another of his acid remarks, but he remained silent.
sentences.chinese: 我等着他再说一句刻薄的话，但他不吭声了。

detailed_translations.english: a chemical substance that has a  pH  of less than 7. Strong acids can burn holes in material or damage your skin
having a sharp sour taste

name: advisable
trans: adj. 明智的; 可取的副 词: advisably

sentences.english: I deem it advisable to buy property now.
sentences.chinese: 我认为现在购置房地产是明智的。

sentences.english: It would't be advisable for us to kiss off their objections.
sentences.chinese: 对人家的意见不予理睬是不明智的。

name: artefact
trans: n. 人工制品，加工品

sentences.english: ancient Egyptian artefacts
sentences.chinese: 古埃及手工艺品

detailed_translations.chinese: 人工制品， 手工艺品
detailed_translations.english: an object such as a tool, weapon etc that was made in the past and is historically important

name: artifact
trans: n. 人工制品;手工艺品;加工品

sentences.english: In the wrong hands this powerful artifact has the ability to unravel the soul.
sentences.chinese: 在错误手这强有力的人工制品有能力解开灵魂。

name: aspiration
trans: n. 强烈的愿望, 志向, 抱负

sentences.english: a high level of political aspiration
sentences.chinese: 崇高的政治抱负

detailed_translations.chinese: 强烈的愿望； 志向， 抱负
detailed_translations.english: a strong desire to have or achieve something

name: attain
trans: vt. 达到，实现；获得；到达; vi. 达到；获得；到达; n. 成就 时 态: attained, attaining, attains 形容词: attainable

sentences.english: More women are attaining positions of power.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多的女性获得要职。

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in achieving something after trying for a long time
to succeed in achieving something after trying for a long time

name: audit
trans: v. 查；审计；稽核; 旁听; n. 审计；稽核; 审查，检查 时 态: audited, auditing, audits

sentences.english: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
sentences.chinese: 每年他们都会审核我们的账目，以证明其准确合理。

detailed_translations.english: to officially examine a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct
an official examination of a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct

name: avenue
trans: n. 林荫道, 大街; 途径, 手段

sentences.english: Fifth Avenue
sentences.chinese: 第五大街

sentences.english: Shaftesbury Avenue
sentences.chinese: 沙夫茨伯里街

sentences.english: a tree-lined avenue
sentences.chinese: 林荫道

detailed_translations.english: used in the names of streets in a town or city

name: ban
trans: vt. 取缔, 查封, 禁止; n. 禁止, 禁令 时 态: banned, banning, bans

sentences.english: Smoking is banned in the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼内禁止吸烟。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something must not be done, seen, used etc
an official order that prevents something from being used or done

name: band
trans: n. 带，箍; 条纹; 价值、数量等的范围；无线电的波段，频带; 一群，一伙; 乐队，乐团; vt. 用带绑扎; vt. & vi. 结合起来；伙同 时 态: banded，bandi...

sentences.english: The band was playing old Beatles songs.
sentences.chinese: 乐队正在演奏披头士的老歌。

sentences.english: I grew up playing in rock bands.
sentences.chinese: 我是在摇滚乐队里玩音乐长大的。

sentences.english: Smith joined the band in 1989.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯在1989年加入这个乐队。

sentences.english: They formed a band when they were still at school.
sentences.chinese: 他们还在读书的时候就组建了一个乐队。

sentences.english: The entertainment includes a disco and live band .
sentences.chinese: 娱乐活动有跳迪斯科和乐队现场演奏。

sentences.english: interviews with band members
sentences.chinese: 对乐队成员的采访

detailed_translations.english: a group of musicians, especially a group that plays popular music

name: behalf
trans: n. 方面, 利益, 赞同

sentences.english: She asked the doctor to speak to her parents on her behalf.
sentences.chinese: 她请医生代她同她父母谈谈。

sentences.english: On behalf of everyone here, may I wish you a very happy retirement.
sentences.chinese: 请允许我代表在座的各位祝你退休后生活愉快。

detailed_translations.english: instead of someone, or as their representative

name: beneath
trans: prep. 在…之下; adv. 在下方

sentences.english: The top layer should now point down to the layer beneath.
sentences.chinese: 现在，顶部图层应当有小箭头指向下面的图层。

sentences.english: The fortress on the hill covered the harbour area beneath.
sentences.chinese: 山上的炮楼把下面的海港地区置于射程之内。

sentences.english: They must all be drowning beneath him, in the watery caves of the rock!
sentences.chinese: 他们一定是在他下面的水里，就在那岩石充满了水的洞中游泳了！

detailed_translations.english: in or to a lower position than something, or directly under something

name: blend
trans: vt. & vi. 混合, 混杂; n. 混合物 时 态: blended , blent blending, blends

sentences.english: Blend the sugar, eggs, and flour.
sentences.chinese: 把糖、鸡蛋和面粉掺在一起。

sentences.english: a blend of tea
sentences.chinese: 混合茶叶

detailed_translations.english: to thoroughly mix together soft or liquid substances to form a single smooth substance
a mixture of different types of the same thing

name: border
trans: n. 边, 边缘; 边界, 边境; vt. & vi. 与…接界, 在…的边上 时 态: bordered, bordering, borders 名 词: borderer

sentences.english: countries that border the Mediterranean
sentences.chinese: 地中海沿岸的国家

sentences.english: ...the European and Arab countries bordering the Mediterranean.
sentences.chinese: …地中海沿岸的欧洲国家和阿拉伯国家。

detailed_translations.english: if one country, state, or area borders another, it is next to it and shares a border with it
a band along or around the edge of something such as a picture or piece of material
A country that borders another country, a sea, or a river is next to it

name: bow
trans: n. 弓；鞠躬；船首; vi. 鞠躬；弯腰; vt. 鞠躬；弯腰; adj. 弯曲的 时 态: bowed, bowing, bows

sentences.english: She bowed and left the stage.
sentences.chinese: 她鞠了一躬，离开了舞台。

sentences.english: Corbett entered the room, bowing respectfully.
sentences.chinese: 科比特走进房间，恭敬地鞠了一躬。

sentences.english: The servant bowed low and handed his master the sealed note.
sentences.chinese: 仆人深深一鞠躬，把那个封好的短笺递给了主人。

sentences.english: This is done with a formal bow to the king or queen.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，还要向国王或女王正式鞠躬行礼。

detailed_translations.english: to bend the top part of your body forward in order to show respect for someone important, or as a way of thanking an  audience
the act of bending the top part of your body forward to show respect for someone when you meet them, or as a way of thanking an audience

name: bullet
trans: n. 子弹；只选某党全部候选人的投票；豆子; vi. 射出；迅速行进

sentences.english: He was killed by a single bullet.
sentences.chinese: 他被一枪打死。

sentences.english: a bullet wound in the shoulder
sentences.chinese: 肩上的枪伤

sentences.english: Several bullet holes could be seen beside a window.
sentences.chinese: 窗户边可以看到几个弹孔。

detailed_translations.chinese: 子弹；只选某党全部候选人的投票；豆子
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of metal that you fire from a gun

name: calibrate
trans: vt. 校准; 使标准化,使合标准; 测量口径 时 态: calibrated, calibrating, calibrates 名 词: calibrator

sentences.english: ...instructions on how to calibrate a thermometer.
sentences.chinese: …校准温度计的说明。

detailed_translations.english: If you calibrate an instrument or tool, you mark or adjust it so that you can use it to measure something accurately

name: canvas
trans: n. 帆布; vt. 用帆布覆盖，用帆布装备; adj. 帆布制的

sentences.english: a canvas bag
sentences.chinese: 帆布包

detailed_translations.english: strong cloth used to make bags, tents, shoes etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 用帆布覆盖，用帆布装备

name: capitalism
trans: n. 资本主义; 资本的拥有; 资本的支配地位

sentences.english: ...the two fundamentally opposed social systems, capitalism and socialism.
sentences.chinese: …两种根本对立的社会制度，资本主义与社会主义。

detailed_translations.english: an economic and political system in which businesses belong mostly to private owners, not to the government

name: cautious
trans: adj. 小心的, 谨慎的副 词: cautiously 名 词: cautiousness

sentences.english: a cautious driver
sentences.chinese: 一位谨慎的司机

sentences.english: a cautious approach to the crisis
sentences.chinese: 处理危机的谨慎态度

sentences.english: The air-pollution board has reacted with cautious optimism to the announcement.
sentences.chinese: 空气污染委员会对这项通告表示谨慎乐观。

detailed_translations.english: careful to avoid danger or risks

name: cement
trans: n. 水泥; 接合剂, 黏合物; vt. 在…上抹水泥; 粘牢; 巩固, 加强 时 态: cemented, cementing, cements 名 词: cementer

sentences.english: a bag of cement
sentences.chinese: 一袋水泥

sentences.english: Most artificial joints are cemented into place.
sentences.chinese: 绝大部分人造关节是被黏结复位的。

detailed_translations.english: a grey powder made from  lime  and clay that becomes hard when it is mixed with water and allowed to dry, and that is used in building
to join two things together using cement , glue, etc.

name: collate
trans: vt. 校对，整理; n. 核对；小吃; n. 校对者，整理者 时 态: collated，collating，collates 名 词: collator

sentences.english: Shall we collate the accounts today?
sentences.chinese: 今天我们要核对帐目吗？

detailed_translations.english: to gather information together, examine it carefully, and compare it with other information to find any differences

name: commence
trans: vt. 开始；着手; vi. 使……开始；使……得学位 时 态: commenced, commencing, commences

sentences.english: Work will commence on the new building immediately.
sentences.chinese: 新大楼即将破土动工。

detailed_translations.english: to begin or to start something

name: commentary
trans: n. 实况报道，解说词; 评论；评注

sentences.english: Commentary is by Tom Ferris.
sentences.chinese: 由汤姆•费里斯现场解说。

detailed_translations.chinese: 实况报道， 解说词； 评论， 评论文章
detailed_translations.english: a spoken description of an event, given while the event is happening, especially on the television or radio

name: compact
trans: n. 合同，契约；小粉盒; adj. 紧凑的，紧密的；简洁的; vt. 使紧密结合；使简洁 时 态: compacted, compacting, compacts 副 词...

sentences.english: The compact design of the machine allows it to be stored easily.
sentences.chinese: 这台机器的设计小巧灵便，易于存放。

sentences.english: The students’ rooms were compact, with a desk, bed, and closet built in.
sentences.chinese: 学生的房间很小巧，配有一张书桌、一张床和一个壁橱。

detailed_translations.english: small, but arranged so that everything fits neatly into the space available – used to show approval
to press something together so that it becomes smaller or more solid
an official contract or agreement

name: compile
trans: vt. 收集；编辑，编制时 态: compiled，compiling，compiles

sentences.english: The document was compiled by the Department of Health.
sentences.chinese: 这份文件是由卫生部汇编的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编
detailed_translations.english: to make a book, list, record etc, using different pieces of information, music etc

name: comprehend
trans: v. 理解, 领会；包括，包含 时 态: comprehended, comprehending, comprehends

sentences.english: She cannot comprehend the extent of the disaster.
sentences.chinese: 她无法理解这场灾难的严重程度。

sentences.english: I did not fully comprehend what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 我没有完全理解发生了什么事。

detailed_translations.english: to understand something that is complicated or difficult

name: compromise
trans: n. 妥协, 折中方法; vi. 折中解决; vt. 连累, 危害, 损害 时 态: compromised, compromising, compromises

sentences.english: She admitted that she was unable to compromise.
sentences.chinese: 她承认自己无法作出妥协。

detailed_translations.chinese: 妥协； 危及； 放弃
detailed_translations.english: to reach an agreement in which everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first
an agreement that is achieved after everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first, or the act of making this agreement

name: conceive
trans: vt. 构思；持有；以为；怀孕; vi. 怀孕；设想；考虑 时 态: conceived, conceiving, conceives 形容词: conceivable ...

sentences.english: He conceived the idea of transforming the old power station into an arts centre.
sentences.chinese: 他想出了一个把旧发电站改造为艺术中心的主意。

sentences.english: God is often conceived of as male.
sentences.chinese: 上帝常常被想象为男性。

sentences.english: She is unable to conceive.
sentences.chinese: 她不能怀孕。

sentences.english: Their first child was conceived on their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 他们的第一个小孩是在新婚之夜怀上的。

detailed_translations.english: to form an idea, a plan, etc. in your mind; to imagine sth

name: concession
trans: n. 承认, 允许; 妥协, 让步; 特许权 形容词: concessional 形容词: concessionary

sentences.english: The British were not prepared to make any concessions .
sentences.chinese: 英国人没有打算作出让步。

sentences.english: the import/export concessions that had been granted to the island
sentences.chinese: 同意给该岛的进出口特许权

detailed_translations.english: something that you allow someone to have in order to end an argument or a disagreement

name: confine
trans: n. 界限，边界; vt. 限制；禁闭 时 态: confined, confining, confines

sentences.english: We confined our study to ten cases.
sentences.chinese: 我们把研究限定在十个案例以内。

sentences.english: Any soldier who leaves his post will be confined to barracks (= made to stay in the barracks ) .
sentences.chinese: 任何擅离职守的士兵都要受到在营房里关禁闭的处罚。

sentences.english: within the confines of the prison
sentences.chinese: 在监狱范围内

detailed_translations.english: to keep someone or something within the limits of a particular activity or subject
limits or borders

name: consciousness
trans: n. 知觉; 意识, 观念, 觉悟; 察觉, 感觉

sentences.english: The painful memories eventually faded from her consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 那些痛苦的回忆最终从她的意识中淡去了。

sentences.english: Hypnosis is an altered state of consciousness .
sentences.chinese: 催眠状态是一种被改变的意识状态。

sentences.english: research into human consciousness
sentences.chinese: 对人类意识的研究

detailed_translations.english: your mind and your thoughts

name: constrain
trans: vt. 强迫，强使；限制，约束时 态: constrained，constraining，constrains 副 词: constrainedly 名 词: cons...

sentences.english: Poor soil has constrained the level of crop production.
sentences.chinese: 贫瘠的土地限制了农作物的产量。

sentences.english: Women’s employment opportunities are often severely constrained by family commitments.
sentences.chinese: 女性的就业机会常常受到家庭责任的严重限制。

detailed_translations.english: to limit something

name: controversy
trans: n. 争论；论战；辩论

sentences.english: a political controversy
sentences.chinese: 政治争议

sentences.english: the controversy surrounding Skinner’s theories
sentences.chinese: 围绕斯金纳的理论的争议

sentences.english: (= began ) over the use of the chemicals on crops.
sentences.chinese: 对庄稼施用化学品的做法引起了争论。

detailed_translations.english: a serious argument about something that involves many people and continues for a long time

name: convenience
trans: n. 方便, 便利; 有用、有益或适宜的安排、用具或设施; 厕所

sentences.english: Ready meals sell well because of their convenience.
sentences.chinese: 即食餐因为方便销路好。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being suitable or useful for a particular purpose, especially by making something easier or saving you time

name: cookery
trans: n. 烹调术；烹调业

sentences.english: a one-year cookery course
sentences.chinese: 为期一年的烹饪课程

sentences.english: French cookery
sentences.chinese: 法式烹调

detailed_translations.english: the art or skill of cooking

name: county
trans: n. 郡, 县形容词: county

sentences.english: Fairfax County, Virginia
sentences.chinese: 弗吉尼亚州费尔法克斯县

detailed_translations.english: an area of a state or country that has its own government to deal with local matters

name: coverage
trans: n. 新闻报道, 报道量; 覆盖范围

sentences.english: live coverage of the match (= the match is broadcast at the same time that it is happening )
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛的现场直播

detailed_translations.english: when a subject or event is reported on television or radio, or in newspapers

name: cradle
trans: n. 摇篮；支船架；发源地；发祥地; vt. 抚育；把...搁在支架上；把...放在摇篮内 时 态: cradled, cradling, cradles

sentences.english: She rocked the cradle to quieten the child.
sentences.chinese: 她摇动摇篮，让宝宝安静下来。

sentences.english: Athens is often regarded as the cradle of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 雅典常常被认为是民主的发源地。

detailed_translations.english: a small bed for a baby, especially one that moves gently from side to side

name: crude
trans: adj. 粗糙的；粗鲁的；天然的，未加工的；粗略的; n. 天然的物质；原油 比较级: cruder, crudest 副 词: crudely 名 词: cru...

sentences.english: a crude wooden bridge
sentences.chinese: 粗糙的木桥

sentences.english: crude oil/metal
sentences.chinese: 原油；未经提炼的金属

detailed_translations.english: not developed to a high standard, or made with little skill

name: crush
trans: vt. & vi. 压碎, 压坏; vt. 弄皱; 镇压, 消灭, 击溃; vi. 挤进, 挤入; n. 拥挤的人群 时 态: crushed, crushing, crushes ...

sentences.english: His leg was crushed in the accident.
sentences.chinese: 他的腿在事故中被压断。

sentences.english: Two people were crushed to death in the rush to escape.
sentences.chinese: 两个人在逃生过程中被踩死。

detailed_translations.english: to press something so hard that it breaks or is damaged

name: declaration
trans: n. 宣布, 宣告, 声明; 申报

sentences.english: to issue/sign a declaration
sentences.chinese: 发布 / 签署公告

sentences.english: the declaration of war
sentences.chinese: 宣战

sentences.english: the Declaration of Independence (= of the United States)
sentences.chinese: （美国）独立宣言

detailed_translations.english: an official or formal statement, especially about the plans of a government or an organization; the act of making such a statement

name: decode
trans: vt. 译码，解码; vi. 从事破译工作 时 态: decoded, decoding, decodes 名 词: decoder

sentences.english: The software decodes the information embedded in the satellite broadcasts.
sentences.chinese: 这种软件能够解读卫星广播中的信息。

detailed_translations.english: if a computer decodes data, it receives it and changes it into a form that can be used by the computer or understood by a person

name: defence
trans: n. 防御；防卫；防卫设备；答辩

sentences.english: soldiers who died in defence of their country
sentences.chinese: 为保卫祖国而献身的战士

sentences.english: The harbour's sea defences are in poor condition.
sentences.chinese: 港口的海防工事状况很差。

sentences.english: He wanted to conduct his own defence.
sentences.chinese: 他想自己为自己辩护。

detailed_translations.english: the act of protecting sb/sth from attack, criticism, etc.

name: definite
trans: adj. 明确的, 确切的; 一定的, 肯定的 副 词: definitely 名 词: definiteness

sentences.english: It’s impossible for me to give you a definite answer.
sentences.chinese: 我不可能给你明确的答复。

sentences.english: We need to record sufficient data to enable definite conclusions to be reached.

detailed_translations.english: the right to vote in national elections

name: superior
trans: adj. 上级的；高傲的；优秀的，出众的; n. 上级，长官；长者；优胜者，高手 名 词: superiority 副 词: superiorly

sentences.english: She had that superior tone of voice.
sentences.chinese: 她带着那种傲慢的语气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 上级的，较高的；优越的；有优越感的，高傲的
detailed_translations.english: thinking that you are better than other people – used to show disapproval
someone who has a higher rank or position than you, especially in a job

name: supplier
trans: n. 供应者；供应厂商，供应国

sentences.english: ...one of the country's biggest food suppliers.
sentences.chinese: …该国最大的食品供应商之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 供应厂商，供应国；供应者
detailed_translations.english: a company or person that provides a particular product

name: surname
trans: n. 姓，姓氏；绰号，别名; vt. 给…起别名；给…姓氏 时 态: surnamed, surnaming, surnames

sentences.english: What is your surname?
sentences.chinese: 你姓什么?

sentences.english: Your surname may be derived from a place, such as Lancaster, for example, or an occupation, such as Weaver, but this is not necessarily of relevance to your family history.
sentences.chinese: 或许，你的姓氏来源于一个地方名，例如兰开斯特，或者来源于职业，例如编织工。 但是，这并不能中肯地说出你家族的历史。

detailed_translations.english: the name that you share with your parents, or often with your husband if you are a married woman, and which in English comes at the end of your full name

name: suspense
trans: n. 悬念；焦虑；悬疑；悬而不决 形容词: suspenseful

sentences.english: Come on then, tell me what happened; the suspense is killing me (= I feel very excited or anxious because I do not know what will happen next ) .
sentences.chinese: 快来，告诉我发生了什么事。急死我了。

sentences.english: She couldn’t bear the suspense a moment longer.
sentences.chinese: 这样提心吊胆，她再也受不了了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 悬念；悬疑；焦虑；悬而不决
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of excitement or anxiety when you do not know what will happen next

name: systematic
trans: adj. 有系统的; 有规则的; 彻底的副 词: systematically

sentences.english: a systematic approach to solving the problem
sentences.chinese: 系统解决问题的办法

detailed_translations.english: done according to a system or plan, in a thorough, efficient or determined way

name: toxin
trans: n. 毒素

sentences.english: Tests showed increased levels of toxin in shellfish.
sentences.chinese: 测试表明贝类中的毒素级别上升了。

detailed_translations.english: a poisonous substance, especially one that is produced by  bacteria  and causes a particular disease

name: transcend
trans: vt. 超出或超越的范围; 优于或胜过… 时 态: transcended, transcending, transcends

sentences.english: The desire for peace transcended political differences.
sentences.chinese: 对和平的渴望超越了政治分歧。

detailed_translations.english: to go beyond the usual limits of something

name: traverse
trans: n. Z形攀登; vt. 横越, 穿越, 横贯; vi. 作Z形攀登 时 态: traversed, traversing, traverses 形容词: traversab...

sentences.english: two minutes to traverse the park
sentences.chinese: 两分钟横穿公园

detailed_translations.english: a sideways movement across a very steep slope in mountain-climbing

detailed_translations.chinese: 穿过；反对；详细研究；在…来回移动
detailed_translations.english: to move across, over, or through something, especially an area of land or water

name: treadmill
trans: n. 枯燥无味的工作〔生活方式〕; 踏车; 跑步机,走步机

sentences.english: the treadmill of working in the office
sentences.chinese: 单调枯燥的办公室工作

detailed_translations.chinese: 踏车； 累人的活； 单调的例行工作， 乏味繁重的工作
detailed_translations.english: work or a way of life that seems very boring because you always have to do the same things

name: unravel
trans: vt. 解开；阐明；解决；拆散; vi. 散开；解决 时 态: unraveled , unravelled unraveling , unravelling unravels ,...

sentences.english: Detectives are still trying to unravel the mystery surrounding his death.
sentences.chinese: 侦探们仍在试图解开他的死亡之谜。

detailed_translations.english: to understand or explain something that is mysterious or complicated

name: utterance
trans: n. 发声，表达; 说话方式；语调; 言论；意见；言辞

sentences.english: These two utterances communicate the same message.
sentences.chinese: 这两句话传递同样的信息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 意见, 说话, 发表
detailed_translations.english: the action of saying something

name: vacuum
trans: n. 真空; 〈口〉真空吸尘器; 空间; 空虚; 空白; vt. 用真空吸尘器清扫

sentences.english: I vacuumed the carpets today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天用吸尘器清洁地毯了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收集； 用真空吸尘器打扫
detailed_translations.english: to clean using a vacuum cleaner
a space that is completely empty of all gas, especially one from which all the air has been taken away

name: vicinity
trans: n. 近, 接近, 密切; 附近, 邻近

sentences.english: The stolen car was found in the vicinity of the station.
sentences.chinese: 被盗汽车在车站附近被发现。

sentences.english: There used to be a mill in the vicinity.
sentences.chinese: 附近曾有一座磨坊。

detailed_translations.english: in the area around a particular place

name: vicious
trans: adj. 恶的, 邪恶的; 残酷的, 狠毒的 副 词: viciously 名 词: viciousness

sentences.english: Sarah can be quite vicious at times.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉有时相当狠毒。

sentences.english: a vicious personal attack on the Duchess
sentences.chinese: 对公爵夫人恶毒的人身攻击

sentences.english: She was shocked by the vicious tone in his voice.
sentences.chinese: 她对他恶毒的语气感到震惊。

detailed_translations.english: very unkind in a way that is intended to hurt someone’s feelings or make their character seem bad

name: virtue
trans: n. 美德, 德行; 优点, 长处

sentences.english: Women have often been used as symbols of virtue.
sentences.chinese: 女性常被用作美德的象征。

sentences.english: Wilkins is now extolling the virtues of organic farming.
sentences.chinese: 威尔金斯现在盛赞有机耕作的好处。

detailed_translations.english: moral goodness of character and behaviour

name: vivid
trans: adj. 鲜明的；鲜艳的；生动的 比较级: vivider, vividest 副 词: vividly 名 词: vividness

sentences.english: I’ve got vivid memories of that summer.
sentences.chinese: 我对那年夏天记忆犹新。

sentences.english: He had a vivid picture of her in his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的脑海中清晰地留着她的形象。

detailed_translations.english: vivid memories, dreams, descriptions etc are so clear that they seem real

name: voucher
trans: n. 证人；保证人；证明者；收据 时 态: vouchered, vouchering, vouchers

sentences.english: The voucher can be used at most major supermarkets.
sentences.chinese: 这种购物券可以在大多数大型超市使用。

sentences.english: First prize is a £1,000 travel voucher.
sentences.chinese: 头等奖是价值1,000英镑的旅行券。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收据；证人；保证人；证明者；代金
detailed_translations.english: a ticket that can be used instead of money for a particular purpose

name: wander
trans: vi. 徘徊；漫步；离题；迷路; vt. 游荡，漫游; n. 闲逛；溜达；游荡；徘徊 时 态: wandered, wandering, wanders 名 词: wan...

sentences.english: She wandered aimlessly around the streets.
sentences.chinese: 她在大街上漫无目的地到处游荡。

sentences.english: Pauline started to wander from the point.
sentences.chinese: 保利娜开始偏题了。

sentences.english: Don’t let any of the kids wander off.
sentences.chinese: 不要让任何一个小孩走开去。

detailed_translations.english: to walk slowly across or around an area, usually without a clear direction or purpose

name: wise
trans: adj. 聪明的；明智的；博学的; vt. 使知道；教导; vi. 了解 比较级: wiser, wisest 副 词: wisely 名 词: wiseness

sentences.english: a wise precaution
sentences.chinese: 明智的预防措施

sentences.english: I don’t think that would be a very wise move (= not be a sensible thing to do ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为那样做不是很明智。

detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

name: yoga
trans: n. 瑜珈；瑜珈术 形容词: yogic

sentences.english: I do yoga twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 我一周做两次瑜伽。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瑜珈（意为“结合”，指修行）；瑜珈术
detailed_translations.english: a system of exercises that help you control your mind and body in order to relax

name: youngster
trans: n. 年轻人;少年，儿童

sentences.english: Other youngsters are not so lucky.
sentences.chinese: 其他的年轻人没有这么幸运。

detailed_translations.english: a child or young person
